2010-11-11

Movember 2010: Favourite moustaches #6 Dick Strawbridge

Oh to have a soup-strainer like the marvellous Dick Strawbridge... he claims to have "the best moustache in showbiz" and seriously, who could argue with that?



During November I'm growing a 'tache to raise money for prostate cancer - come sponsor me over here.
